1427280.name: wonShot Demo
1427280.description: Its your first day of work at the Galactic Federation of Several Planets. Your job is to destroy as many enemy ships as possible with your giant laser, but there is one thing we didn't mention in orientation; due to budget cuts the laser only fires once per day. Also, if you can't meet a minimum quota you will be terminated. Travel through the galaxy destroying the rebel army one shot at time in wonShot!
